page.title: 13Children's Posessions
page.content:
{Article Own items, Shared items, Nil average average {BEDROOM 59% 41% 0% BIKE 97% 3% 0% {T.V. 16% 63% 1% RADIO 33% 67% 0% {BINOCULARS 10% 90% 0% CAMERA 34% 66% 0% {WATCH 88% 0% 12%
The majority of children have their own bedroom.All the children we interviewed had the use of a bike and only 3% had to share a bike.The majority of children share a T.V. with the rest of the family,though more children had their own radio.Cameras and binoculars were mostly shared with the rest of the family,but more children had their own cameras than binoculars. Only 12% of children didn't have a watch.
